T02D2673:100b-1: a'arya su b'a hu pa ri pritstsha n'a ma tantra pind'artha pi ti /

T02D2673:102b-0: gshegs pa'i byin @102b gyi rlabs las byung ba yang

T02D2673:103a-0: kha cig tu ni rgyas par spros la zhes bya ba @103a * //

T02D2673:104b-7: de la yongs su brtags pas /
T02D2673:104b-8: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la 'jug go zhes bstan to //
T02D2673:104b-9: tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2673:104b-10: tshol dang mdza' bshes dang ni rnam par bral //
T02D2673:104b-11: mi sdug pa dang phrad cing 'dod pas gdungs //
T02D2673:104b-12: ngan pa skye rga 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal can //
T02D2673:104b-13: yul rnams kun du song na'ang med pa min //
T02D2673:104b-14: sha sbrang tsha grang bkres dang ngal la sogs //
T02D2673:104b-15: gang du song na'ang sdug bsngal nyid yin pas //
T02D2673:104b-16: yul la mngon dga'i sems ni byung ba na //
T02D2673:104b-17: rnam rtog de dag rnams kyis bzlog par bya //
T02D2673:104b-19: 'dis ni sred pa'i rgyu ni tshor ba ste /
T02D2673:104b-20: de la yongs su brtags pas kun 'byung ba'i bden pa la 'jug go zhes bstan to //
T02D2673:104b-21: sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2673:104b-22: sems ni glog dang spre'u dang rlung dang mtshungs /
T02D2673:104b-23: rgya mtsho chen po yi ni rlabs dang 'dra //
T02D2673:104b-24: sgyu can 'dod dgur 'dod yon mngon dga' ba /
T02D2673:104b-25: g-yo zhing 'phyan pa nges par gdul bar bya /
T02D2673:104b-27: de'i phyir bcom ldan rgyal ba'i dbang po yis //
T02D2673:104b-28: chos 'di kun gyi rtsa ba sems zhes gsungs //
T02D2673:104b-29: sems ni dang bar lha mi bde ba dang //
T02D2673:104b-30: mtho ris dang ni byang grol thob par 'gyur ;
T02D2673:104b-31: sems kyi skyon gyis dud 'gror skye ba dang //
T02D2673:104b-32: sems dmyal gnas shing mi sdug dbul por 'gyur //
T02D2673:104b-33: sems ni rab tu dang bar gyur pa'i mis //
T02D2673:104b-34: sa chu me rlung skye rga 'chi sogs dang //
T02D2673:104b-35: bar dang tha mar gnod pa kun bral ba //
T02D2673:104b-36: rnam grol bde zhing zhi ba thob par 'gyur //
T02D2673:104b-37: gsang sngags dngos grub kun dang thun mong ba /
T02D2673:104b-38: bde ba chung zhing sdug bsngal brgya dang 'brel /
T02D2673:104b-39: nyon mongs dug bcas rnam par 'jig 'gyur ba //
T02D2673:104b-40: dang po'i sems kyis thob par gyur pa yin //
T02D2673:104b-42: 'dis ni rtag tu mngon par zhen pa'i gzhi ni sems te /
T02D2673:105a-0: @105a * // de la yongs su brtags pas 'gog pa'i bden pa la 'jug ste /
T02D2673:105a-1: bdag chad par dogs pa'i 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan to //
T02D2673:105a-2: chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i dbang du mdzad nas //
T02D2673:105a-3: 'dod rgyal las kyang ma byung dus las min //
T02D2673:105a-4: rang bzhin dbang phyug las kyang ma yin te //
T02D2673:105a-5: rgyu med can min skyes bus ma byas kyang //
T02D2673:105a-6: las dang nyon mongs pa las sems can byung //
T02D2673:105a-7: gzugs ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ldan //
T02D2673:105a-8: de ni bdag min gzugs kyang bdag ma yin //
T02D2673:105a-9: gzugs la bdag med bdag la gzugs med de //
T02D2673:105a-10: gzugs ni stong pa'o phung bzhi'ang rig par gyis //
T02D2673:105a-11: gzugs ni dbu ba rdos pa dag dang 'dra ba ste /
T02D2673:105a-12: tshor ba chu'i chu bur bzhin du rtag pa med //
T02D2673:105a-13: de ltar mthong ba lta ba bzang po yin //
T02D2673:105a-14: gang zhig gzhan gyur de ni lta ngan gsungs //
T02D2673:105a-16: 'dis ni chos la yongs su brtags pas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D2673:105a-17: rnam par byang ba'i chos la rmongs pa med pa'i phyir /
T02D2673:105a-18: lam gyi bden pa la 'jug go zhes bstan to //
T02D2673:105a-20: gnas ngan len phyir srid rgyu'i phyir //
T02D2673:105a-21: gzhi yi phyir dang ma rmongs phyir //
T02D2673:105a-22: bden pa bzhi la 'jug bya bas //
T02D2673:105a-23: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom //
T02D2673:105a-24: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgoms pa de nyid la mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang /
T02D2673:105a-25: gnyen po gnyis skyed pa dang /
T02D2673:105a-26: ma skyes pa tha dad pas brtson 'grus rnam pa bzhi 'byung ba ni /
T02D2673:105a-27: yang dag par spang ba ste /
T02D2673:105a-28: mi mthun pa'i phyogs bsal ba la skyes pa rnams kyi rgyud bcad pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2673:105a-29: tshig rtsub phra ma kyal pa smra ba dang //
T02D2673:105a-30: gzhan gyi bud med bgrod dang brdzun smra dang //
T02D2673:105a-31: rku dang gzhan gyi srog gcod gnod byed dang //
T02D2673:105a-32: chang dad byed pa rtag tu spang bar bya //
T02D2673:105a-33: rmongs pa gang gis lus dang ngag dang ni /
T02D2673:105a-34: de bzhin yid kyi bsod nams bsags byas kyang //
T02D2673:105a-35: thams cad log par lta bas bcom pas na /
T02D2673:105a-36: de yi rnam smin mi 'dod 'bras bur 'gyur //
T02D2673:105a-37: dper na sa dang chu dang dus ldan yang //
T02D2673:105a-38: sa bon tshig pa myu gu mi skye ltar //
T02D2673:105a-39: de bzhin mi shes log ltas bcom pa yi //
T02D2673:105b-0: sems las dge ba'i chos @105b rnams mi skye'o //
T02D2673:105b-1: rtag tu sems ni dge ba bcu dag gi //
T02D2673:105b-2: chos kyi lam la gnas par byas na legs //
T02D2673:105b-4: ser sna dregs dang rgyags pa rnam spangs te //
T02D2673:105b-6: 'di ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do //
T02D2673:105b-10: yang dag par rab tu 'jog go zhes bstan to //
T02D2673:105b-11: mi mthun pa'i phyog bsal ba lam skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2673:105b-12: gang zhig dgra bcom pha ma gsod pa dang //
T02D2673:105b-13: thub pa'i dge 'dun dbyen ni byed pa dang ;
T02D2673:105b-14: / de bzhin gshegs la sdang ba'i sems kyis su //
T02D2673:105b-15: nam zhig mi dag sku mtshal 'byin byed pa //
T02D2673:105b-16: shin tu mi bzad pa yi las 'di rnams //
T02D2673:105b-17: rgyal bas mtshams med lnga po yin par bshad //
T02D2673:105b-18: gti mug gis ni sdig pa ci byas na'ang //
T02D2673:105b-19: phung po 'di la grub pa thob mi 'gyur //
T02D2673:105b-20: mchod rten 'jig cing byang chub sems dpa' gsod //
T02D2673:105b-21: nyon mongs zad pa'i ma ni sun 'byin dang //
T02D2673:105b-22: slob pa gsod kyi dge 'dun mnga' ba la //
T02D2673:105b-23: gang zhig 'dod pas mang nyung rku 'phrog dang //
T02D2673:105b-24: mtshams med nye ldar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs //
T02D2673:105b-25: tshul nyams mi ni 'ga' zhig 'di byed pa //
T02D2673:105b-26: bskal pa'i bar du mnar med sdug bsngal myong //
T02D2673:105b-27: gsangs sngags dngos grub bsgrims kyang yod mi 'thob //
T02D2673:105b-28: gang zhig bde gshegs gsung gi glegs bam dag / chud gzon pa 'am mes ni sreg pa dang //
T02D2673:105b-29: bsam pa ngan pas chur ni 'dor ba dang//
T02D2673:105b-30: yang na chos kyi sku ni spong ba'am //
T02D2673:105b-31: bslab tshig ma lus pas ni brgyan pa yi //
T02D2673:105b-32: dge slong dag dang dge slong ma gsod dang //
T02D2673:105b-33: dge bsnyen dang ni dge bsnyen ma gsod dang //
T02D2673:105b-34: ngan pa'i sems kyis lha khang sreg kyang rung //
T02D2673:105b-35: mi yi yul ni sdig pa 'di byas pa //
T02D2673:105b-36: dka' ba spyod bar ldan yang grub mi thob //
T02D2673:105b-37: gang zhig dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa yi //
T02D2673:105b-38: bsam pas gnod pa cung zad byas kyang rung //
T02D2673:105b-39: bdag nyid mnar med yun ring dmyal bar btso //
T02D2673:105b-40: de las thar na'ang las kyi dbang gis ni //
T02D2673:105b-41: rigs ngan mi dang dud 'gror skye ba 'thob //
T02D2673:106a-3: gang zhig mi bzad las byed thub pa gsod //
T02D2673:106a-4: rig sngags gcod dang gnon par byed ba'am //
T02D2673:106a-5: bsam pa ngan pas gsang sngags tshogs mi mchod //
T02D2673:106a-6: don med bzhin du sen mos rtsa gcod dang //
T02D2673:106a-7: rkang pas rkang mnyed pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2673:106a-8: sna 'bigs dge 'dun la ni mi gus dang //
T02D2673:106a-9: 'byung po byin pa'am lha bshos gtor ma'am //
T02D2673:106a-10: sa la lhung ba sngags pas bza' mi bya //
T02D2673:106a-11: 'dod chags zil gyis non pas dud 'gre dang //
T02D2673:106a-12: bud med bgrod bya min par bgrod mi bya //
T02D2673:106a-13: glang chen mi gdul sbrul yang mi gzung zhing //
T02D2673:106a-14: rta rgyug pa dang lcag gis gzhu mi bya //
T02D2673:106a-15: gang zhig sems can na dang sdug bsngal la //
T02D2673:106a-16: byams pa'i bsam pa brtan po med pa dang /
T02D2673:106a-17: las de rnams dang ldan par gyur pa de'i //
T02D2673:106a-18: dngos grub nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2673:106a-19: dper na nam mkha' mtha' thug med pa la //
T02D2673:106a-20: 'dom gyis bcal bas mtha' rtogs mi nus ltar //
T02D2673:106a-21: de bzhin dkon mchog gsum la brten nas ni //
T02D2673:106a-22: phan gnod byas pa'i dge sdig mtha' mi rtogs //
T02D2673:106a-23: rgya dang rnyi gtor rtsa ba'i dug dag gis //
T02D2673:106a-24: khyi la sogs pa'i sems can gsod pa dang ;
T02D2673:106a-25: / bya rog la sogs gzeb kyis bcing byas na //
T02D2673:106a-26: 'di dang pha rol du yang grub mi thob //
T02D2673:106a-27: bdud dgra'i me tog rnying pa bor ba rnams //
T02D2673:106a-28: rkang bas mi brdzi mgo la gdags mi bya //
T02D2673:106a-29: bkres pas gdungs kyang de dag rnams la ni //
T02D2673:106a-30: phul ba'i lha bshos nam yang bza' mi bya ;
T02D2673:106a-32: 'dis ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir /
T02D2673:106a-37: yang dag par rab tu 'jog go zhes bstan to //
T02D2673:106a-39: ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2673:106a-40: dge dang mi dge'i shes pa gzung na ni //
T02D2673:106a-41: bram ze dmangs rigs dag la khyad par med //
T02D2673:106a-42: 'on kyang 'gro ba'i blos ni bram ze dang //
T02D2673:106a-43: 'di ni dmangs rigs yin zhes brtags par zad //
T02D2673:106b-0: bden pa'i lam dmigs dge ba'i rjes @106b 'brangs nas //
T02D2673:106b-1: dmangs rigs dag kyang rga shi med par 'gro //
T02D2673:106b-2: log pa'i lam zhugs nyes par spyod ldan na //
T02D2673:106b-3: bram ze gang yin mi bzad dmyal bar ltung //
T02D2673:106b-4: lus can shin tu dri ma ldan pa dag /'di na gzhan gyis 'dag par mi 'gyur te //
T02D2673:106b-5: de ni sdig pa rnam par bsal ba dang ;
T02D2673:106b-6: / bsod nams ma lus yongs su bzung bas 'dag / ces gsungs te /
T02D2673:106b-7: 'dis ni dge ba'i chos rnams ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir /
T02D2673:106b-12: yang dag par rab tu gzhog go zhes bstan to //
T02D2673:106b-13: gnyen po bskyed pa la skyes pa rnams kyi rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2673:106b-14: de ltar sdig pa'i chos la rnam grol nas //
T02D2673:106b-15: bde bar gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa'i chos //
T02D2673:106b-16: dag cing grol ba dang ni ldan gyur pa //
T02D2673:106b-17: zlos pas skyon mdo sde bklag par bya //
T02D2673:106b-18: gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa yi phyogs su ni //
T02D2673:106b-19: 'jim pa'am ni bye ma las byas pa'i //
T02D2673:106b-20: bde gshegs mchod rten rten 'brel snying po can //
T02D2673:106b-21: sdig pa sbyang ba'i phyir ni rtag tu gdab //
T02D2673:106b-22: ring bsrel can gyi gzugs sam mchod rten la //
T02D2673:106b-23: bstod cing 'phreng ba dri dang mar me dbul //
T02D2673:106b-24: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dri dang rol mo dang //
T02D2673:106b-25: mchog tu dang pa yis ni mchod par bya //
T02D2673:106b-27: ji ltar chu klung nyin mtshan rtag tu ni //
T02D2673:106b-28: rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab par 'gyur ba ltar //
T02D2673:106b-29: de bzhin phyag bcas bzlas dang brtul zhugs kyi //
T02D2673:106b-30: bsod nams lus can la ni 'phel ba 'gyur //
T02D2673:106b-32: ji ltar sbyin sreg dang ni bzlas brjod kyis //
T02D2673:106b-33: gsang sngags bsgrubs kyang dngos grub ma thob na //
T02D2673:106b-34: 'jim pa la ni mchod rten 'bum gdab pa 'am //
T02D2673:106b-35: yang na chu 'gram bye ma dag la gdab //
T02D2673:106b-36: des ni de yi sdig pa sreg gzhan la //
T02D2673:106b-37: byas pa gang yin de ni zad gyur nas //
T02D2673:106b-38: des na gsang sngags mthu yis 'di nyid la //
T02D2673:106b-39: mthong ba'i chos la bsod nams 'bras bu thob //
T02D2673:106b-41: 'dis ni dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang /
T02D2673:107a-6: yang dag par rab tu 'jog go zhes bstan to //
T02D2673:107a-8: mi mthun phyogs dang gnyen po rnams //
T02D2673:107a-9: rnam pa thams cad yongs shes nas ;
T02D2673:107a-10: / de dag yang phyir brtson 'grus ni //
T02D2673:107a-11: rnam pa bzhi dag rab tu 'byung //
T02D2673:107a-12: mi mthun pa'i phyogs bsal ba'i brtson 'grus brtsam pa'i
T02D2673:107a-13: sems gnas pa'i lus las su rung ba nyid rdzu
T02D2673:107a-14: 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhir 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T02D2673:107a-15: yang dag par spong ba'i 'og tu /
T02D2673:107a-16: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bstan to //
T02D2673:107a-17: de la 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du mdzad nas //
T02D2673:107a-18: de yi bde bar gshegs la dad bskyed nas //
T02D2673:107a-19: de bzhin du ni byang chub sems kyang bskyed //
T02D2673:107a-20: rdo rje'i rigs zhes brjod pa rgya chen dang //
T02D2673:107a-21: nga la yang ni dad cing dga' bar bya //
T02D2673:107a-24: 'dun pa'i dbang gis brtson 'grus rtsom pa la gus
T02D2673:107a-25: par 'jug na sems rtse gcig pa nyid la reg
T02D2673:107a-27: brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2673:107a-28: grags dang ma grags rnyed dang ma rnyed dang //
T02D2673:107a-29: bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin bstod dang smad ;
T02D2673:107a-30: / sems kyis 'jig rten chos rnams rab bcom ste //
T02D2673:107a-31: sdig pa'i gnas su gyur pa spang bar bya //
T02D2673:107a-32: dper ni rgya mtsho skad cig tsam yang ni //
T02D2673:107a-33: mi yi ro dang lhan cig mi gnas ltar //
T02D2673:107a-34: de bzhin rnam rtog sems kyis sdig byas pa //
T02D2673:107a-35: sngags pa skad cig tsam yang gnas mi bya ;
T02D2673:107a-37: 'dis ni gang gi tshe brtson 'grus rtsom pa na
T02D2673:107a-38: rtag par sbyor bas sems rtse gcig pa nyid la
T02D2673:107a-40: sems kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du byas nas /
T02D2673:107a-41: 'phags pa gtsug na rin po ches zhu ba'i mdo las /
T02D2673:107a-42: snying rje chen po rab tu thob bas sems yengs
T02D2673:107a-43: par 'gyur zhes 'byung ba dang mthun par gsungs te
T02D2673:107a-44: / byams dang snying rje'i chus gdab zhe sdang la //
T02D2673:107a-46: 'dis ni sngon gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sa bon la brten nas /
T02D2673:107a-47: rang bzhin gyi snying rje chen pos sems 'dzin cing /
T02D2673:107b-0: sems rtse gcig @107b pa nyid la reg go zhes bstan to //
T02D2673:107b-1: dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du byas nas /
T02D2673:107b-2: re zhig cig na dgra yang mdza' bor 'gyur //
T02D2673:107b-3: mdza' bo dag kyang dgrar ni 'gyur ba nyid //
T02D2673:107b-4: de bzhin kha cig kyang ni bar mar 'gyur //
T02D2673:107b-5: bar ma de nyid kyang ni dgra bor 'gyur //
T02D2673:107b-6: de ltar mdza' bshes 'gyur bar rig bya ste //
T02D2673:107b-7: blo gros ldan pas nam yang chags mi bya //
T02D2673:107b-8: gnyen la dga' ba'i sems kyi rnam rtog dag / bzlog nas dge la ci bde gzhag par bya //
T02D2673:107b-10: le lo 'dod chags mi dger ldan pa'i sems //
T02D2673:107b-11: gang dang gang du g-yeng zhing rgyu ba dag / de dang de nas myur du bzlog nas ni //
T02D2673:107b-12: gsang sngags yi ge mchod la legs par sbyar //
T02D2673:107b-14: 'dis ni gang gi tshe dmigs pa rab tu rnam
T02D2673:107b-15: par 'byed pa na sems rtse gcig pa nyid la
T02D2673:107b-17: sems las su rung ba de'i dgod pa gang zhe na /
T02D2673:107b-18: le lo dang ni gdams ngag rnams //
T02D2673:107b-19: brjed dang bying dang rgod pa dang //
T02D2673:107b-22: zhes bya ba 'di spang bar dgongs pa'o //
T02D2673:107b-25: gnas dang de la gnas pa dang //
T02D2673:107b-27: dmigs pa brjed par gyur pa dang //
T02D2673:107b-28: bying dang rgod pa rtogs pa dang //
T02D2673:107b-29: de yang mngon par 'du byed dang //
T02D2673:107b-33: der gnas las su rung ba nyid //
T02D2673:107b-35: / nyes pa lnga spong 'du byed brgyad //
T02D2673:107b-36: brten pa'i rgyu las byung ba'o //
T02D2673:107b-37: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis sems las su rung nas /
T02D2673:107b-38: de'i 'og tu thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa la dbang byed pas /
T02D2673:107b-40: dbang po lnga rnam par gzhag go //
T02D2673:107b-41: dad pa'i dbang po'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2673:107b-42: dkon mchog gsum la dad pas brten par bya //
T02D2673:107b-44: 'dis ni gang yod pa nyid dang /
T02D2673:107b-45: yon tan can dang bus pa rnams la go rims bzhin du /
T02D2673:107b-46: mngon par yid ches pa dang /
T02D2673:108a-2: dad pa'i mtshan nyid du bstan to //
T02D2673:108a-3: brtson 'grus kyi dbang du mdzad nas //
T02D2673:108a-4: sos ka'i nags me mched pa'i me lce yis //
T02D2673:108a-5: ma bsgrims bzhin du tshang tshing kun bsreg ltar //
T02D2673:108a-6: bzlas brjod me la tshul khrims rlung gi sbar //
T02D2673:108a-7: brtson 'grus chen po'i me lces sdig pa bsreg / ces gsungs te /
T02D2673:108a-8: 'dis ni de ltar dad par 'gyur ba ni 'khor
T02D2673:108a-9: ba'i btson ra nas 'byung bar sbyor bas de'i phyir
T02D2673:108a-10: / brtson 'grus rtsom mo zhes bstan to //
T02D2673:108a-11: dran pa'i dbang po'i dbang du mdzad nas //
T02D2673:108a-12: 'phags pa gtsug na rin po che'i mdo las /
T02D2673:108a-13: yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa ni /
T02D2673:108a-14: dran pa'i dbang po zhes 'byung ba dang mthun par gsungs te /
T02D2673:108a-15: me tog dri snod mar me phul ba dang //
T02D2673:108a-16: tshul khrims brtson 'grus dka' thub byas pa yis //
T02D2673:108a-17: dge ba de kun bla na med pa yis //
T02D2673:108a-18: sangs rgyas byang chub bla med mchog tu bsngo //
T02D2673:108a-19: dper na chu klung rgya mtshor phyin pa na //
T02D2673:108a-20: lan tshva'i ro ni gcig tu 'gyur ba bzhin //
T02D2673:108a-21: de ltar bla med byang chub bsngos pa yi //
T02D2673:108a-22: bsod nams rgyal ba'i ror ni gcig tu 'gyur //
T02D2673:108a-23: dper na skyes bu la las 'bras bu'i phyir //
T02D2673:108a-24: s'a lu bskyed kyi sog ma'i phyir min yang //
T02D2673:108a-25: s'a lu rnyed nas bsgrims pa med par ni //
T02D2673:108a-26: sog ma'i phung po zhar la 'byung ba bzhin //
T02D2673:108a-27: de bzhin byang chub 'bras bu 'dod pa'i phyir //
T02D2673:108a-28: bsod nams sgrub kyi longs spyod phyir min yang //
T02D2673:108a-29: sog ma'i phung po dag dang mtshungs par ni //
T02D2673:108a-30: ma bsgrubs bzhin du mi yi longs spyod grub //
T02D2673:108a-31: tshe ring ba 'di legs par thob pa dang ;
T02D2673:108a-32: / chos bzhin bsgrub pa'i yul dag rnyed pa'am //
T02D2673:108a-33: skye ba med par 'gyur zhing 'gro ba yi //
T02D2673:108a-34: bsam pa rnams ni rtag tu rdzogs par bya //
T02D2673:108a-36: 'di ni de'i 'bras bu la re ba bsgrubs pas
T02D2673:108a-37: tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2673:108a-39: 'greng dang 'dug dang gnyid log nyal ba dang //
T02D2673:108a-40: 'gro 'phres za klog bzlas brjod byed pa na //
T02D2673:108a-41: rjes su dran pa so so'i yon tan dang //
T02D2673:108a-42: rigs par bcas te rjes su dran par bya //
T02D2673:108a-44: bde gshegs chos dang dge 'dun bcas par dran byas te //
T02D2673:108b-0: sh'a ri'i bu dang nga la @108b thal sbyar btud nas nyal //
T02D2673:108b-1: de ltar sbags pa'i sdig pa mtha' dag zad par bya //
T02D2673:108b-3: lha la sogs dang bgegs dang log 'dren rnams //
T02D2673:108b-4: brtul zhugs gnas pa de la glags mi lta //
T02D2673:108b-5: dper na lo tog thams cad sa dag la //
T02D2673:108b-6: brten nas skyon med par ni skye ba ltar //
T02D2673:108b-7: de bzhin tshul khrims bsten nas chos dkar mchog / snying rje'i chus brlan pas ni rnam par skye //
T02D2673:108b-8: rgyal ba ngas gsungs so so thar pa yi //
T02D2673:108b-9: tshul khrims rnam dag 'dul ba ma lus las //
T02D2673:108b-10: sngags pa khyim pas rtags dang cho ga spang //
T02D2673:108b-11: lhag ma rnams ni nyams su blang bar bya //
T02D2673:108b-13: lha yi bde ba dang ni 'byor pa dang //
T02D2673:108b-14: tshe dang stobs gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang //
T02D2673:108b-15: thos mong mdangs bzang gcig tu yid gzhungs dang //
T02D2673:108b-16: dbang thang che kun dka' thub stobs kyis 'thob //
T02D2673:108b-18: gang gi tshe na sems ni dang ba yis //
T02D2673:108b-19: mi yi yul nas byang chub sems blangs pa //
T02D2673:108b-20: de ni phyin chad lha dang lha min dang //
T02D2673:108b-21: 'jig rten ma lus rnams kyi phyag byar 'os //
T02D2673:108b-22: mis ni mngon par mtho ba ma lus pa'i //
T02D2673:108b-23: bslab pa mtha' dag blangs par gyur pa dang //
T02D2673:108b-24: sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin pa dang //
T02D2673:108b-25: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yang bsab pa yin //
T02D2673:108b-26: zhes gsungs pa 'di dag gis ni /
T02D2673:108b-27: dmigs pa bsal ba'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02D2673:108b-28: dran pa'i dbang por bstan te /
T02D2673:108b-29: des kyang tshul khrims kyi bslab pa bsgrub par stan to //
T02D2673:108b-30: ting nge 'dzin gyi da par po'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2673:108b-31: ji ltar gangs la nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis //
T02D2673:108b-32: gdungs na gzi brjid mi bzod 'ju ba bzhin //
T02D2673:108b-33: tshul khrims nyi ma'i 'od zer bzlas brjod kyis //
T02D2673:108b-34: gdungs na sdig pa'i gangs kyang zad par 'gyur //
T02D2673:108b-35: mun nag smag la mar me phyung ba yis //
T02D2673:108b-36: mun nag ma lus sel bar byed pa ltar //
T02D2673:108b-37: tshe rabs stong nas gnas pa'i sdig pa'i mun //
T02D2673:108b-38: bzlas brjod mar mes myur du sel bar byed //
T02D2673:108b-40: tshe rabs gzhan du gang dang gang byas pa'i //
T02D2673:108b-41: sdig pa ma lus bzlas brjod byas pas 'byang //
T02D2673:108b-42: bzlas pas sdig pa ma lus byang gyur na //
T02D2673:109a-1: po'i yid kyis dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2673:109a-3: 'dis ni ting nge 'dzin ni rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rgyu dang bcas pa yin pas //
T02D2673:109a-4: sems kyi bslab pa bsgrub par bstan to //
T02D2673:109a-5: shes rab kyi dbang po'i dbang du mdzad nas //
T02D2673:109a-6: las kyi dbang gyur bdag po med pa dang //
T02D2673:109a-7: mgon med rten med tshe rabs gcig nas gcig / lus kyi kha brgyud rjes su rab 'gro ba //
T02D2673:109a-8: de yi rjes su dge dang mi dge 'brang //
T02D2673:109a-10: 'dis ni shes rab kyi dbang pos chos rnam par 'byed pa bsten to //
T02D2673:109a-12: thar pa'i cha dang mthun ba skyed nas //
T02D2673:109a-13: 'dun dang sbyor dang dbang byed de //
T02D2673:109a-14: dmigs pa brjed par ma gyur dang //
T02D2673:109a-16: dad pa la sogs de dag nyid //
T02D2673:109a-17: stobs dang ldan par gyur pa la //
T02D2673:109a-18: stobs rnams zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2673:109a-20: mi mthun phyogs ni bsrabs pa'i phyir //
T02D2673:109a-21: stobs ldan 'bras bu phyi ma yin //
T02D2673:109a-22: dbang po rnams kyang stobs rnams la //
T02D2673:109a-23: nges 'byed cha mthun gnyis gnyis so //
T02D2673:109a-24: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni zag
T02D2673:109a-25: pa med ba'i chos 'byung ba'i tshul du rig par
T02D2673:109a-26: bya ste / chos kyi mchog gi 'og tu /
T02D2673:109a-28: stobs kyi 'og tu byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bshad do //
T02D2673:109a-29: de la dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2673:109a-30: sngags kyi rtsa ba dang por tshul khrims te //
T02D2673:109a-31: des na brtson 'grus dang ni bzod pa dang //
T02D2673:109a-32: rgyal ba la ni dad dang byang chub sems //
T02D2673:109a-33: gsang sngags dang ni le lo med pa'o //
T02D2673:109a-35: chags dang rnam bral dge la dga' ba dang //
T02D2673:109a-36: rtag tu dkon mchog gsum la sems gzhol zhing //
T02D2673:109a-37: sdig pa spangs shing bzlas brjod ldan pa yi //
T02D2673:109a-38: mi la lha rdzas dngos grub ring ba med //
T02D2673:109a-40: khyod kyis ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du //
T02D2673:109a-41: mi yis legs par spyad pa bgyis nas ni //
T02D2673:109a-42: de dag myur du dbul ba'i mun bsal nas //
T02D2673:109a-43: nyi ma bzhin du shin tu 'bar bar 'gyur //
T02D2673:109a-44: yan lag mi nyams sems kyang mi nyams shing //
T02D2673:109b-0: nad dang @109b sdug bsngal lus nyams mi 'gyur ba //
T02D2673:109b-1: khyod la dad pa'i mis ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D2673:109b-3: byang chub kyi gnas kyi yan lag ste //
T02D2673:109b-4: dran pa'i stobs kyis dmigs pa de las ma g-yeng ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan to //
T02D2673:109b-5: chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2673:109b-6: lus dang ngag yid lag pa mig dag ni //
T02D2673:109b-7: smin mtshams yan lag rnam par g-yo ba dag / rab tu bsdams nas de la yid gzhol zhing //
T02D2673:109b-8: byams la gnas zhing ku sha'i khres la 'dug / ji srid du ni rtse gcig gnas gyur pa //
T02D2673:109b-9: de srid du ni 'bum mam nyis 'bum bzlas //
T02D2673:109b-11: 'dis ni rang bzhin gyi yan lag bstan te /
T02D2673:109b-12: byang chub ni ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2673:109b-14: brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2673:109b-15: ji ltar ri dags dbang po bkres pa dag / mthu stobs chen pos glang chen gsod pa dang //
T02D2673:109b-16: de bzhin sbyang ku phag dang ri dags dang //
T02D2673:109b-17: wa rnams kyang ni myur du gsod pa ltar //
T02D2673:109b-18: de bzhin sngags pa seng ge'i tshul gyis su //
T02D2673:109b-19: rab dang 'bring dang tha ma'i las rnams la /
T02D2673:109b-20: brtson 'grus chen po dang ni ldan pa dang //
T02D2673:109b-21: 'bad pa mchog rnams kyis kyang brtan par bya //
T02D2673:109b-23: 'dis ni nges par 'byung ba'i yan lag ste /
T02D2673:109b-24: des so so skye bo'i sa las shin tu 'da' ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan to //
T02D2673:109b-25: dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2673:109b-26: rtse gcig sems dang ldan pa'i mi la ni //
T02D2673:109b-27: yid las byung ba'i dga' ba rab tu skye //
T02D2673:109b-28: dga' bas lus ni shin tu sbyangs pa 'thob //
T02D2673:109b-29: lus sbyangs pa ni bde ba'i skal ldan 'gyur //
T02D2673:109b-30: lus bde rtse gcig sems dang ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2673:109b-31: de tshe bzlas brjod dogs pa med par 'gyur //
T02D2673:109b-33: 'dis ni phan yon gyi yan lag bstan te /
T02D2673:109b-34: des lus dang sems la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan to //
T02D2673:109b-35: shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2673:110a-2: sems ni sdig la nam yang dga' mi 'gyur //
T02D2673:110a-3: bkres skom tsha grang rlung dang ngal ba yi //
T02D2673:110a-4: sdug bsngal drag pos nyen kyang g-yo mi 'gyur //
T02D2673:110a-5: sbrang bu sha sbrang srin bu grog sbur dang //
T02D2673:110a-6: sdig sbrul rkang brgya pa dang sbur dang 'dre //
T02D2673:110a-7: sha za srul po rnams kyang de yi ni //
T02D2673:110a-8: lus dang dri ma la yang mi 'gong ngo //
T02D2673:110a-9: tshig ni gzung bar 'os shing yid gzhungs la //
T02D2673:110a-10: snyan dngags dang ni bri ba rnams la mkhas //
T02D2673:110a-11: chos la mngon dga' gter rnams mthong ba dang //
T02D2673:110a-12: lus kyi nad dang dri ma med par 'gyur //
T02D2673:110a-13: skye bos mthong ngam thos par gyur kyang rung //
T02D2673:110a-14: myur du mngon dga' yid du 'ong bar 'gyur //
T02D2673:110a-15: bud med 'dod lha'i mdas phog pa rnams kyis //
T02D2673:110a-16: 'dod pa longs spyod spyir ni 'bod par 'gyur //
T02D2673:110a-17: gang tshe mkha' las lha dang gnod sbyin dang //
T02D2673:110a-18: dri za lha yi bu mo'i lus dang sgra //
T02D2673:110a-19: mis ni dag pa'i yid kyis mthong thos nas //
T02D2673:110a-20: de tshe shin tu nye bar gyur pa yin //
T02D2673:110a-22: 'dis ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i gzhi yin pas /
T02D2673:110a-23: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ni rnam par dag pa'o zhes bstan to //
T02D2673:110a-24: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2673:110a-25: dper na rlung med khang pa'i nang du ni //
T02D2673:110a-26: mar me btsugs pa mi g-yo 'bar ba ltar //
T02D2673:110a-27: rtse gcig sems kyis zlos la mngon dga' ba'i //
T02D2673:110a-28: lus la chos kyis de bzhin 'bar bar 'gyur //
T02D2673:110a-30: 'dis ni lus dang sems gnyis shin tu sbyangs pas rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
T02D2673:110a-32: sems mnyam par gzhag na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
T02D2673:110a-33: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bas /
T02D2673:110a-34: nyon mongs pa rnam so sor spong ngo zhes bstan to /
T02D2673:110a-35: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2673:110a-36: sna rtser blta zhing rnam par rtog pa spong //
T02D2673:110a-37: nam zhig bskyod kyang rnam par mi g-yo ba //
T02D2673:110a-38: de tshe dmigs la gnas pa thob ba ste //
T02D2673:110a-39: sems ni las su rung bar gyur par nges //
T02D2673:110b-0: btang snyoms ldan zhes kyang @110b gsungs te /
T02D2673:110b-1: 'dis ni kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa dang mthun pa'i sems mi nyams pa dang /
T02D2673:110b-2: sems rnal du mi 'jug pa dang /
T02D2673:110b-3: sems rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i
T02D2673:110b-4: phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa med ba'i ngo bo
T02D2673:110b-5: nyid do // 'dir tshigs su bcad pa /
T02D2673:110b-6: rang bzhin yan lag gnas yan lag / gsum pa des 'byung yan lag ste //
T02D2673:110b-7: bzhi pa phan yon yan lag yin //
T02D2673:110b-8: rnam gsum nyon mongs med yan lag /'di la gzhi dang gnas dang ni //
T02D2673:110b-9: ngo bo nyid du bstan pa yin //
T02D2673:110b-10: byang chub kyi yan lag gis mthong ba gang yin
T02D2673:110b-11: pa'i lam de thob par bsgoms pas mthong ba'i lam
T02D2673:110b-12: gyi 'og tu bsgom pa'i lam du bstan pa ni
T02D2673:110b-13: lam gyi yan lag brgyad de /
T02D2673:110b-14: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs yan lag brgyad lam 'di //
T02D2673:110b-15: yang dag 'tsho dang las mtha' ting 'dzin dag / rtsol dang rtog dang dran dang lta ba rnams //
T02D2673:110b-16: so so so sor yang dag bsten par bya //
T02D2673:110b-18: ming tsam brjod pas rang gi ngo bo mi shes pa'i phyir re re nas ston te /
T02D2673:110b-19: de la yang dag ba'i lta ba'i dbang du mdzad nas //
T02D2673:110b-20: 'jigs kyang tshangs pa brgya byin khyab 'jug dang /
T02D2673:110b-21: drag po rlung sogs lha la phyag mi bya //
T02D2673:110b-22: de yis bshad pa'i chos la mi brten zhing //
T02D2673:110b-23: de dag dka' thub mi spyad rtags mi mchod //
T02D2673:110b-24: de rnams chos la'ang ngan sems mi bya zhing //
T02D2673:110b-25: de yi spyod la nam yang dga' mi bya //
T02D2673:110b-26: de dag bstod pa mi gdon sngags mi bzlas //
T02D2673:110b-27: sbyin pa sbyin tshe snying rje bskyed nas sbyin //
T02D2673:110b-28: bde bar gshegs pa kun gyis bsten pa yi //
T02D2673:110b-29: gnas dang rgyal sras rnams la phyag bya'o //
T02D2673:110b-30: rang sangs rgyas dang rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams //
T02D2673:110b-31: de dag rtag tu phyag bya'i gnas yin no //
T02D2673:110b-32: de ltar zla ba tshes la mi rnams ni //
T02D2673:110b-33: phyag 'tshal nya la phyag ni mi 'tshal med //
T02D2673:110b-34: de bzhin dad pas rgyal ba'i thugs sras la //
T02D2673:110b-35: phyag bya'i de ltar bde bar gshegs la min //
T02D2673:110b-36: 'jig rten kun gyi mngon mtho'i bslab pa can //
T02D2673:110b-37: snying rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i don du ni //
T02D2673:110b-38: skye ba len pa de la ci yi phyir //
T02D2673:110b-39: bu gcig bdag nyid kun gyis phyag mi bya //
T02D2673:111a-2: de la mi ngan gang zhig mi 'dud pa //
T02D2673:111a-3: de la rgyal ba thams cad thugs nur nas //
T02D2673:111a-4: de yi gsang sngags dngos grub mi stsol to //
T02D2673:111a-5: dper na shing gi me tog dang por ni //
T02D2673:111a-6: yid 'ong phyi nas 'bras bur gyur pa ltar //
T02D2673:111a-7: sems can mchog rnams me tog 'dra bar ltos //
T02D2673:111a-8: 'bras bu bzhin du rgyal ba rig par gyis //
T02D2673:111a-9: gang gi rang bzhin chags dang rnam bral yang //
T02D2673:111a-10: gdul bya'i don phyir khro la khro ba dang //
T02D2673:111a-11: 'dod chags can la chags can ltar ston pa //
T02D2673:111a-12: byang chub mchog gnas de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2673:111a-13: gang zhig las dang rnam smin mkhyen pa yis //
T02D2673:111a-14: 'gro ba kun dang ji ltar mthun pa yi //
T02D2673:111a-15: gsang sngags gzugs la rjes su chags mdzad pa //
T02D2673:111a-16: sngags kyi rnam 'dren de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2673:111a-17: zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i lta ba'i rgyu ste /
T02D2673:111a-18: 'dir rgyu la 'bras bu btags nas yang dag pa'i lta bar gzhag go //
T02D2673:111a-20: de phyir log par lta ba rnams spangs la //
T02D2673:111a-21: yang dag lta ba la ni brten par gyis //
T02D2673:111a-23: 'dis ni mthong ba'i lam gyis rtogs pa la /
T02D2673:111a-24: bdag gis 'di lta bu rtogs so zhes yongs su gcod par bstan to ;
T02D2673:111a-25: / yang dag pa'i rtog pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2673:111a-26: bud med mtshan nyid skyes pa'i mtshan nyid dang //
T02D2673:111a-27: sman dang glang chen brtag pa'am skar ma'i dpyad //
T02D2673:111a-28: mtshon cha brtag pa'am rta dpyad rang bzo'am //
T02D2673:111a-29: bstan bcos ngan pa slob cing klog pa yang //
T02D2673:111a-31: 'dir ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs tsam zhig smos te /
T02D2673:111a-32: dngos su ni yang dag pa'i rtog pas dag kun nas slong ste /
T02D2673:111a-33: ma brtags ma dpyad par tshig mi smra ba'i phyir /
T02D2673:111a-34: yang dag pa'i rtog pas bslang ba'i dag ni gzhan la go bar byed pa'i yan lag go //
T02D2673:111a-35: yang dag pa'i ngag gi dbang du byas nas /
T02D2673:111a-36: yul sa'i gtam dang mi dbang bsten pa dang //
T02D2673:111a-37: dmag dang gyad dang na chung gtam dag dang //
T02D2673:111a-38: sgrung ldebs dang ni sngon gyi lo rgyus gtam //
T02D2673:111a-39: 'dod chags dang ni smad 'tshong gtam mi bya //
T02D2673:111b-0: 'dir ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs tsam zhig gsungs @111b te ;
T02D2673:111b-1: dngos su gzhan dag la rgol zhing len 'debs pa na /
T02D2673:111b-2: bsnyad pa dang 'brel pa'i gtam rnam par nges pa 'dis ni /
T02D2673:111b-3: de kho na nyid nges par rtog so zhes shes rab la gzhan dag yid ches par 'gyur ro //
T02D2673:111b-4: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2673:111b-5: bdag la bstod par nam yang mi bya zhing //
T02D2673:111b-6: sems can gzhan la smad par mi bya'o //
T02D2673:111b-7: stag dang sbrul dang me 'drar 'jig rten dag / bsams nas spangs te dben la dga' bar bya //
T02D2673:111b-9: sngags pa gsang sngags bslab pa mnos pa ni //
T02D2673:111b-10: grong dang grong khyer khyim dang gtsug lag khang //
T02D2673:111b-11: mchod rten bsti gnas ri dang dka' thub gnas //
T02D2673:111b-12: kun dga' lu ma rdzing bur 'gro mi bya //

T02D2673:111b-16: nags tshal stong pa dag dang yul stong dang /

T02D2673:111b-27: de bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags pa yang //
T02D2673:111b-28: zla ba gsum du gcig tu gnas pa gsungs //

T02D2673:111b-31: dbyar 'das nas ni gsang sngags gzi bskyed pas //
T02D2673:111b-32: bdag nyid bsrung byas sgrub la 'jug par bya //
T02D2673:111b-34: 'dis ni nyes par spyod pa dang ;

T02D2673:111b-39: bstan to // yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'i dbang du mdzad nas //
T02D2673:112a-2: chos gos dang ni bsod snyoms ngan ngon dang //

T02D2673:112a-4: chog pa'i sems dang ldan pas bsod nams thob //
T02D2673:112a-6: gtsug phud gzhag ste skra ni bregs nas su //
T02D2673:112a-7: 'byung khungs tshon gyis gos kyi kha dog bsgyur //
T02D2673:112a-8: gos dkar dag gam shing lo'am gso ma'am //
T02D2673:112a-9: zar ma'am shing shun rnams kyi gos bgo'o //
T02D2673:112a-10: ku ba'am lcags sam 'jim pa las byas pa //
T02D2673:112a-11: dbyibs ni legs shing mi rtsub 'jam pa dang //
T02D2673:112a-12: mchog tu zlum zhing ma gas rma med par //

T02D2673:112a-14: bza' btung med cing dmangs rigs mang ba dang //
T02D2673:112a-15: mgron la mchod byed legs par gnas pa'i grong //

T02D2673:112a-18: nga rgyal gyis ni non pa'i bram ze rnams //
T02D2673:112a-19: rigs kyis rlom zhing snying rje mi ldan pa //

T02D2673:112a-21: mchod pa mthong nas bgegs kyang byed par 'gyur //
T02D2673:112a-22: bram ze sangs rgyas pa la ji ltar dman //
T02D2673:112a-23: smra las bram ze dag la dmangs rigs rnams //
T02D2673:112a-24: bsnyen bkur dang ni mchod par 'byung bas na//
T02D2673:112a-25: dmangs rigs kyis kyang gsang sngags ji ltar bzlas //
T02D2673:112a-26: lha dang mgron mchod pa dang las drug dang //
T02D2673:112a-27: rgyal po dang ni me la brten pa dang //
T02D2673:112a-28: bu yi don du 'gro bar bya ba dag / bram ze rnams kyis nges par bsgrubs pa yin //
T02D2673:112a-29: rgyal rigs rje'u rigs rnams kyang rang gi las //

T02D2673:112a-35: bram ze'i dus ni phyi dro yin pas na //

T02D2673:112a-37: dper na rma ni gso dang bsal ba'i phyir //
